```{r load packages, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
```

I will load the dataset and conduct basic data cleaning to include only salad restaurants.

```{r load and clean data}
data("rest_inspec")

rest_inspec =
  rest_inspec |>
  select(-phone, -grade_date, -record_date) |>
  rename(
    name = dba,
    id = camis) |>
  mutate(
    boro = str_to_title(boro),
    name = str_to_title(name),
    name = replace(name, name == "Cava Grill", "Cava"),
    name = replace(name, name == "Cava Mezzo Grill", "Cava")) |>
  drop_na() |>
  filter(
    boro != "Missing",
    action != "Missing",
    name %in% c("Sweetgreen", "Just Salad", "Cava", "Fresh & Co"))
```
